instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200 ̊C, gas mark 6; line a 12-hole muffin tin with cases. Whisk the flours, baking powder, salt and spices in a bowl. Stir in the dates and blueberries.

Whisk together the eggs, buttermilk, oil, lemon zest and juice, vanilla, date nectar and banana. Fold into the dry ingredients until combined; don’t overmix. Spoon into the cases, piling them high; bake for 25-30 minutes. Cool in the tin for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
